Name: Wrestler
Motto:
"Nitendo vincimus"
("By doing our utmost we win")
Fate:
Mined off Juno Beach, 6 June 1944
Sold for scrap, 20 July 1944
Draught:
9 ft (2.7 m) standard
11 ft 3 in (3.43 m) deep
Range:
3,500 nmi (6,500 km) at 15 kn (28 km/h; 17 mph)
900 nmi (1,700 km) at 32 kn (59 km/h; 37 mph)
Armament:
4 × QF 4 in (102 mm) gun
2 × QF 2 pdr "pom-pom" (40 mm) or 1 × QF 12 pdr (76 mm)
2 × triple 21 inch (533 mm) torpedo tubes
